title: Charmed Again
description: Once a Manang: a half-man, half-angel, now a full angel, Creed has darkness in him that threatens to take him over. If it succeeds, he will be forever lost.  One woman has the power to take away the darkness, but she is held captive by an evil Creed alone can save her from. He only has to save himself first.
author: Lindy Zart
